meanings.definition: In a manner that is endearing or lovable.
meanings.sent1: She smiled darlingly at the puppy.
meanings.sent2: The child hugged her teddy bear darlingly.
meanings.sent3: The kitten blinked darlingly at the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The flowers swayed darlingly in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: His laughter rang out darlingly in the room.

meanings.definition: In a way that shows affection or fondness.
meanings.sent1: He spoke darlingly to his grandmother on the phone.
meanings.sent2: The couple held hands darlingly as they walked.
meanings.sent3: The old dog wagged its tail darlingly at the treat.
meanings.sent4: The sun set darlingly behind the mountains.
meanings.sent5: Her eyes sparkled darlingly when she saw her favorite dessert.
